pageContext.claim: “Lisa Page, who may hold the record for the most Emails in the shortest period of time (to her Lover, Peter S), and attorney Baker, are out at the FBI as part of the Probers getting caught? Why is Peter S still there? What a total mess. Our Country has to get back to Business!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is talking about two former FBI officials— James A. Baker and Lisa Page. Both officials resigned and neither has been charged with any wrongdoing in the Justice Department's investigation of leaks. Baker told the New York Times, he was leaving for the Brookings Institution.
